Title: Creates the mobile high-technology training facilities program
Summary: Creates the mobile high-technology training facilities program to award one to one matching grants on a competitive basis to qualified applicants for the design, development and/or outfit of mobile high-technology training facilities that complement certificate, degree or other recognized credentialing programs.
LawCode: Add ยง361, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to creating the mobile high-technology training facilities program
